auth.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please login again.
auth.loggedOut: You have been logged out of the site. Please login again.
auth.siteNotFound: We could not find the site you were looking for. Please login again.
auth.credentialsNotFound: We could not find the stored credentials for this site. Please try logging in again.
auth.setupInstructions: To use the Raven mobile app, you need to configure OAuth in your Frappe site.
auth.step1: Go to OAuth Client in your site
auth.step3: Set the redirect URI to: raven://oauth-callback
auth.step4: Copy the Client ID and use it here
auth.fetchSiteInfoFailed: Failed to fetch site information. Please check the URL and try again.
auth.oauthNotConfigured: Failed to fetch site information / OAuth client not set for Raven Mobile
auth.offlineMessage: The app is offline. Please check your internet connection.

channels.channelTypeDescription: Channels are where your team communicates. They are best when organized around a topic - #development, for example.
channels.privateChannelDescription: Only invited members can view and join
channels.openChannelDescription: Anyone can view and post messages
channels.publicChannelHelperText: When a channel is set to public, anyone can join the channel and read messages, but only members can post messages.
channels.privateChannelHelperText: When a channel is set to private, it can only be viewed or joined by invitation.
channels.openChannelHelperText: When a channel is set to open, everyone is a member.

validation.nameTooLong: Channel name cannot be more than 50 characters
validation.nameTooShort: Channel name cannot be less than 3 characters
validation.nameInvalid: Channel name can only contain letters, numbers and hyphens

channels.leaveChannelMessage: Are you sure you want to leave {{channelName}} channel?
channels.archiveChannelMessage: Are you sure you want to archive {{channelName}} channel?
channels.deleteChannelWarning: Please understand that when you delete {{channelName}}
channels.deleteChannelInfo: All messages, including files and images will be removed.
channels.deleteChannelArchiveHint: You can archive this channel instead to preserve your messages
channels.deleteChannelConfirmCheckbox: Yes, I understand, permanently delete this channel
channels.convertToTypeWarning: Please understand that when you make {{channelName}} a {{type}} channel:
channels.convertToPublicInfo: Anyone from your organisation can join this channel and view its message history. If you make this channel private, it will be visible to anyone who has joined the channel up until that point.
channels.convertToPrivateInfo: No changes will be made to the channel's history or members. All files shared in this channel will become private and will be accessible only to the channel members.
channels.convertToOpenInfo: Everyone from your organisation will become a channel member and will be able to view its message history. If you later intend to make this private you will have to manually remove members that should not have access to this channel.
channels.notMember: You are not a member of this channel
channels.notThreadMember: You are not a member of this thread

convertChannelDescription.toPublic: Anyone from your organisation can join this channel and all current channel members will remain in the channel. No changes will be made to the channel's history or members.
convertChannelDescription.toPrivate: No changes will be made to the channel's history or members. Channel will be visible only to its members.
convertChannelDescription.toOpen: Everyone from your organisation will become a channel member. No changes will be made to the channel's history or members.

channels.channelBeginning: You're at the beginning of this channel.
channels.channelIntro: This is the very beginning of the
channels.markAsReadFailed: Failed to mark channels as read

members.removeMemberMessage: {{name}} will no longer have access to {{channelName}} channel.

messages.deleteMessageWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this message? It will be deleted for all users.
messages.noMentionsDescription: When someone mentions you in a message, you'll see it here.
messages.noSavedMessagesTitle: Your saved messages will appear here
messages.noSavedMessagesDescription: Saved messages are a convenient way to keep track of important information or messages you want to refer back to later.
messages.noSavedMessagesHint: You can save messages by simply clicking on the bookmark icon in message actions.
messages.dmIntroSelf: This space is all yours. Draft messages, list your to-dos, or keep links and files handy.
messages.dmIntro: This is a direct message channel between you and
messages.dmUserNotFound: We could not find the user for this DM channel

polls.pollDescription: Create a quick poll to get everyone's thoughts on a topic.
polls.question: Question
polls.submitToViewResults: Submit your vote to view results

threads.noThreadsDescription: Threads help keep conversations organized. Reply to any message to start a new thread or use the thread icon on messages to join existing discussions.
threads.noResultsFoundDescription: No threads match your search for "{{query}}". Try a different search term.
threads.allCaughtUpDescription: There are no unread threads to show. Clear the filter to see all threads.
threads.leaveThreadMessage: Are you sure you want to leave this thread?
threads.deleteThreadMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this thread?

profile.removeImageConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this image?
profile.fullNameFootnote: This name will be used to identify you in the app.
profile.customStatusFootnote: Share what you are up to.

media.imageSelectionError: There was an error while selecting images
media.cameraError: There was an error while launching the camera
media.shareFileFailed: There was an error sharing the file. Please try again.
media.documentSelectionError: There was an error while selecting the document

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.previewLoadError: There was an error loading preview data.
errors.userListLoadError: There was an error while loading the user list.
errors.channelListLoadError: There was an error while loading the channel list.

directMessages.createDMFailed: Could not create a DM channel
directMessages.noUsersFoundWithQuery: No users found with '{{query}}' in their name
directMessages.allUsersHaveDM: There are no users that you do not already have a DM channel with
directMessages.tryDifferentSearch: Try searching for a different user name
directMessages.startConversation: Start a new conversation with someone to see it here

preferences.doubleTapFootnote: Set your preferred emoji for reactions on double tap.
preferences.quickReactionsFootnote: Tap an emoji to set it as your preferred reaction.

setup.howToSetupMobile: How do I setup my site for Raven mobile?
setup.title: Set up Raven mobile on your site
setup.step1: Open Raven on your desktop browser
setup.oauthDescription: This will create an OAuth client that users can use to authenticate securely on the mobile app.
setup.adminNote: PS: Only System Administrators can do this.
